author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update dense indexing of Hcal calibration channels to be used during LS2 and post LS2 period

#### PR validation:

Tested with a specific code to see the translation from DetId to DenseId and vice versa

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Not to be back ported
title: Run2-hcx210 Update dense indexing for Hcal Calibration Channels
